channel.title: Stronger antenna for Carloop
channel.description: I drive to the edge of cell service quite a bit. I've been moving the antenna around a lot to try to get the best signal. Is it possible to get an antenna with a longer wire, so that it can be placed in a more ideal area. Most of the underbody where OBD connectors are seem to be very good at blocking GSM signal
